content.title: Designed to bring unity to our digital experiences.
content.summary: Green Design System is more than a polished user interface, its places the user at the very forefront of design, usability and accessibility.

items.title: Alert
items.summary: An alert displays important messages, feedback, or time-sensitive information.

items.title: Badge
items.summary: A compact visual indicator for status, counts and notifications.

items.title: Blur
items.summary: The Blur component is used to apply a blur effect over content, often used to obscure sensitive or background information.

items.title: Breadcrumbs
items.summary: A breadcrumb is a secondary navigation showing the website hierarchy.

items.title: Button
items.summary: A button can be tapped or clicked to perform an action.

items.title: Calendar
items.summary: The calendar displays a grid of selectable dates.

items.title: Card
items.summary: The card groups related content into a single container.

items.title: Checkbox
items.summary: A checkbox is a form element that allows users to select one or multiple options.

items.title: Coachmark
items.summary: Coachmarks guide users through interface features.

items.title: Context menu
items.summary: A context menu displays a list of contextual actions.

items.title: Datepicker
items.summary: ⁠The datepicker allows users to select a date.

items.title: Details
items.summary: The details component is a collapsible section that helps organize and hide content until needed.

items.title: Dialog
items.summary: ⁠A dialog appears in front of content to provide critical information or ask for a decision.

items.title: Div
items.summary: Div is a base element in the declarative layout system.

items.title: Divider
items.summary: Divider creates visual and semantic separation between content.

items.title: Dropdown
items.summary: A dropdown enables the user to choose one or multiple options from a list.

items.title: FAB
items.summary: Floating action button persists across screens for constant access to features that needs to be accessible at all times.

items.title: Filter chips
items.summary: Filter chips allow users to narrow down the data they want to see on the page.

items.title: Form summary
items.summary: Form summary shows all form errors in one place.

items.title: Grid
items.summary: The grid is a custom element that provides a flexible grid system.

items.title: Icon
items.summary: An icon helps communicate meaning quickly, enhances visual hierarchy, and supports navigation or interaction.

items.title: Image
items.summary: An image displays media with configurable dimensions and styling properties.

items.title: Input
items.summary: An input lets users enter and edit text or numerical values in forms.

items.title: Link
items.summary: A link navigates users to other pages or sections of content.

items.title: Menu button
items.summary: A menu button combines button and link behaviors for navigation menus.

items.title: Popover
items.summary: A popover is a temporary view that appears above other content.

items.title: Radio
items.summary: A radio button is a form element that allows users to select one of the predefined set of choices.

items.title: Rich text
items.summary: Rich text can be used to wrap generic HTML content and apply typography styles.

items.title: Segmented control
items.summary: Segmented control allows users to select a single option, immediately changing the display to reflect their selection. It is used for switching views or view options, not for navigation.

items.title: Select
items.summary: A select enables the user to choose one or multiple options from a list.

items.title: Signal
items.summary: A signal draws attention to notifications and new content.

items.title: Text
items.summary: Text summary

items.title: Textarea
items.summary: Textarea allow users to input text and digits on multiple lines.

items.title: Theme
items.summary: Theme summary

items.title: Video
items.summary: Video summary

items.title: About
items.summary: Green Design System is the design system for Skandinaviska Enskilda Banken to make it easier and faster to build beautiful digital products and experiences under the SEB brand.

items.title: Accessibility
items.summary: Accessibility is a essential part of our digital experience. Approximately 20% of people experience permanent, temporary, or situational difficulties when using websites that lack accessible design. By creating an inclusive environment, we make our services easier to use for everyone — improving clarity, usability, and overall experience.

items.title: Foundation
items.summary: Green Design System, a framework designed to bring unity, efficiency, and coherent perspective to our digital experiences. Over time it will grow and evolve but always reflect our design philosophy. User needs first, being forefront and with confidence.

items.title: UX writing
items.summary: Regardless of where, when or how the customer meets us, the experience of SEB must be the same because each meeting contributes to how we are perceived. A positive customer experience opens the door to new business. This is particularly important in texts aimed at customers. Mistakes affect the reader's concentration on the content and understanding of the text. Because our texts are correct, our credibility with customers and other visitors (=potential customers) increases.

items.title: Alert: Action
items.code: Actionable Alert with a button for quick user interaction.

items.title: Alert: Dissmisible
items.code: Dismissible User can dismiss this alert.

items.title: Alert: Information
items.code: Information Body text starts on the same row as heading.

items.title: Alert: Negative
items.code: Negative Error message requiring user attention.

items.title: Alert: Notice
items.code: Notice Body text with link or additional context.

items.title: Alert: Positive
items.code: Positive Feedback message with optional CTA.

items.title: Alert: Warning
items.code: Warning Important information to consider.

items.title: Badge: Lead

</gds-flex>

      padding="s"

    <gds-card
      variant="secondary"
      border-color="secondary"

      height="80px"
      justify-content="flex-end"

      variant="tertiary"

items.title: Hero: Form summary
items.code:
<form>
  <gds-flex flex-direction="column" gap="m" align-items="center" justify-content="center" max-width="300px">
    <input
      id="designation"
      type="text"
      aria-invalid="true"
      data-label="Designation"
      data-errormessage="A designation is required"
      required=""
      hidden
    />
    <gds-form-summary id="summary"></gds-form-summary>
  </gds-flex>
</form>

items.title: Hero: Grid
items.code:
<gds-grid columns="12" gap="xs" width="280px">
  <gds-card
    variant="secondary"
    border-color="primary"
    grid-column="1/13"
    border-radius="xs"
    height="2xl"
    padding="xs"
  >
    <gds-text tag="small">Nav</gds-text>
  </gds-card>
  <gds-card
    variant="secondary"
    border-color="primary"
    grid-column="1/5"
    border-radius="xs"
    height="6xl"
    padding="xs"
  >
    <gds-text tag="small">Sidebar</gds-text>
  </gds-card>
  <gds-card
    variant="secondary"
    border-color="primary"
    grid-column="5/13"
    border-radius="xs"
    height="6xl"
    padding="xs"
  >
    <gds-text tag="small">Content</gds-text>
  </gds-card>
</gds-grid>

items.title: Hero: Menu button
items.code:
<gds-div 
  width="max-content"
  flex-direction="row"
  border-color="primary"
  background-color="transparent"
  padding="0"
  border-width="0 0 4xs 0"
  gap="0"
>
  <gds-menu-button compact selected>
    <gds-icon-bell slot="trail"></gds-icon-bell>
    Notification
  </gds-menu-button>
  <gds-popover>
    <gds-menu-button compact slot="trigger">
      <gds-icon-people slot="trail"></gds-icon-people>
      Profile
    </gds-menu-button>
    <gds-flex padding="m">Profile stuff</gds-flex>
  </gds-popover>
  <gds-menu-button
    href="https://github.com/seb-oss/green"
    compact
    target="_blank"
  >
    <gds-icon-square-arrow-top-right
      slot="trail"
    ></gds-icon-square-arrow-top-right>
    External
  </gds-menu-button>
</gds-div>

    flex-direction="column"
    gap="s"
    padding="m"
    align-items="flex-start"
    width="280px"

    <gds-text tag="h3">Custom popover!</gds-text>
    <gds-text tag="p"> Popover content </gds-text>

  </gds-flex>
</gds-popover>

<gds-select plain width="280px">

  <select>
    <option value="">Select a value</option>
    <optgroup label="Physics">
      <option value="quantum-mechanics">Quantum Mechanics</option>
      <option value="relativity">Relativity</option>
    </optgroup>
    <optgroup label="Chemistry">
      <option value="organic-chemistry">Organic Chemistry</option>
      <option value="inorganic-chemistry">Inorganic Chemistry</option>
    </optgroup>
    <optgroup label="Biology">
      <option value="genetics">Genetics</option>
      <option value="microbiology">Microbiology</option>
      <option value="ecology">Ecology</option>
    </optgroup>
  </select>
</gds-select>

items.title: Hero: Text
items.code:
<gds-flex width="280px" flex-direction="column" gap="s">
  <gds-flex gap="m">
    <gds-text> Text </gds-text>
    <gds-text text-decoration="underline"> is </gds-text>
    <gds-text text-decoration="currentcolor wavy underline">
      Awesome!
    </gds-text>
  </gds-flex>
  <gds-flex>
    <gds-text font-size="body-s" lines="2" color="secondary">
      Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
    </gds-text>
  </gds-flex>
</gds-flex>

items.title: Hero: Textarea
items.code:
<gds-flex width="280px">
  <gds-textarea
    label="Label"
    supporting-text="Label support text"
    resizable="false"
  >
  </gds-textarea>
</gds-flex>

items.title: Hero: Theme
items.code:
<gds-flex gap="m">
  <gds-theme color-scheme="light" design-version="2023">
    <gds-card variant="secondary" align="center">
      <gds-icon-sun size="xl"></gds-icon-sun>
    </gds-card>
  </gds-theme>
  <gds-theme color-scheme="dark" design-version="2023">
    <gds-card variant="primary" align="center">
      <gds-icon-moon size="xl"></gds-icon-moon>
    </gds-card>
  </gds-theme>
</gds-flex>

items.title: Hero: Video
items.code: <gds-video width="100%" height="100%" object-fit="cover" object-position="center" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gtv-videos-bucket/sample/BigBuckBunny.mp4" playsinline muted autoplay loop></gds-video>

items.title: Segmented control: Icons
items.code:
<gds-segmented-control value='2' width="400px">
  <gds-segment value="1">
    <gds-flex align-items="center" justify-content="center" gap="xs">
      <gds-icon-square-grid-circle size="m"></gds-icon-square-grid-circle>
      Item 1
    </gds-flex>
  </gds-segment>
  <gds-segment value="2">
    <gds-flex align-items="center" justify-content="center" gap="xs">
      <gds-icon-devices size="m"></gds-icon-devices>
      Item 2
    </gds-flex>
  </gds-segment>
  <gds-segment value="3">
    <gds-flex align-items="center" justify-content="center" gap="xs">
      <gds-icon-brand-green size="m"></gds-icon-brand-green>
      Item 3
    </gds-flex>
  </gds-segment>
</gds-segmented-control>

items.title: Segmented control: overflow
items.code:
<gds-segmented-control value="1" width="80%">
  <gds-segment value="1" min-width="200px">Min-width</gds-segment>
  <gds-segment value="flaschenabfüllmaschine" max-width="150px">Flaschenabfüllmaschine</gds-segment>
  <gds-segment value="longlonglong">Long long label</gds-segment>
  <gds-segment value="longlabel">An even longer long label</gds-segment>
  <gds-segment value="pinetrees">Pinetrees</gds-segment>
</gds-segmented-control>

items.title: Segmented control: size default
items.code:
<gds-segmented-control width="280px" value="2">
<gds-segment value="1">Item 1</gds-segment>
<gds-segment value="2">Item 2</gds-segment>
<gds-segment value="3">Item 3</gds-segment>
</gds-segmented-control>

items.title: Segmented control: size small
items.code:
<gds-segmented-control width="280px" value='2' size="small">
<gds-segment value="1">Item 1</gds-segment>
<gds-segment value="2">Item 2</gds-segment>
<gds-segment value="3">Item 3</gds-segment>
</gds-segmented-control>
